articles.description: Nation's second-largest bank has said it plans to boost the company's baseline hourly pay to $25 by 2025.
articles.content:
Bank of America is giving its lowest-paid employees a bump in wages to $22 an hour, equivalent to nearly $46,000 a year for full-time workers.
The Charlotte, North Carolina-based company's pay incre… [+2008 chars]
